title: A Good Blended Vegetable Soup
description: This blended vegetable soup is a delicious delivery vehicle for a range of hearty vegetables. If you have onions, potatoes, carrots, and broccoli to use up, this is a great option. A soup that is a unfussy as it gets, easily adaptable as well. Continue reading A Good Blended Vegetable Soup on 101 Cookbooks
author: Heidi Swanson
